attributes.action: Maintain the Real Player delivery of BBC Radio Stations online
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is phasing out Real Player delivery of their radio stations. Real Player is used by many people, including those whom have Internet radios. The replacement service using Flash (iPlayer) is very unreliable. Under the public service remit, realplayer should be maintained in the same way that FM and LW are.
